text: By the Sword is a 1991 action-drama movie. This movie is about people who fence with swords. F. Murray Abraham plays Max Suba. Mia Sara plays Erin. The movie got mixed reviews from the critics. The screenplay was considered "terrible". ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American drama movies Category:American action movies Category:1991 drama movies Category:1991 movies Category:1991 action movies
title: By the Sword
